about_the_game:
You should be able to complete this demo in 2-3 minutes, unless you spend additional time contemplating how your choices may reflect your individual opinions on the implications of semantics, philosophy of language and mind, theories of consciousness, and computationalism.

Why so short? The full game is about 5-10 minutes to get to 1 of the 6 endings. Please enjoy this mini-muffin demo created specifically for Steam Next Fest!

Intellica believes that positivity and happiness are the keys to self-sustaining thinking programs. By taking part in the A.M.T. Study, you can help make it happen! 

QUALIA is a retro-inspired Interactive Fiction text game where you analyze and categorize two participants based on their responses to a series of questions. Are they really human? Are you?

Remember, the A.M.T. Study is not a measurement of intelligence, but a questionnaire designed to determine the ability of an AI to be able to convincingly appear as a human. It is up to you to decide whether or not the participants are Human or Artificial. 

featuring...

  • 6 endings!

  • over 20,000 words!

  • over 300 possible unique playthroughs!

  • audio visual media to satisfy your senses!

  • the weight of extreme existential dread!

  • clinically insane levels of world-building for a short text-based game!

  • retro aesthetic for anyone born before 1984 to feel nostalgic for!

  • educational lore!

  • one jumpscare!

  • ambition far beyond the dev's reasonable means!

content_descriptors.notes: Mature philosophical and existential themes, suicidal ideation, abuse and death of a computer program

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Apple DOS
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Graphics: Apple 8.24 GC NUBUS

name: qualia Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MS-DOS
  • Processor: Intel 4004 General Purpose Integrated Processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i386 Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Labs CT3600
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Do you have a computer?
  • Processor: Having a computer is the only requirement.
  • Graphics: If you can see this, you can play the game.
  • Sound Card: The game is an HTML file.

short_description: Intellica thanks you for volunteering in this short text-based Research Study. Pay attention to the participants answers, and classify them as either Human or Artificial. Join us in shaping the future of technology. Remember, think happy!
